website_summaries.verdict: This product contains both an enzyme to tackle pet odors and an anti-allergen to help with pet dander allergies.
pros: Designed to work with Kirby vaccum
cons: This product must be diluted and may harm your carpet if left on full strength

customer_reviews.title: NOT PROFESSIONAL STRENGTH!! EXACTLY THE SAME AS $26 BOTTLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISING!!! This is NOT PROFESSIONAL STRENGTH!! It is exactly the same as the $26 Kirby lavender pet shampoo bottle!! I paid more because I was led to believe it was professional strength, not just the regular pet shampoo!!! So now do I just lose the $10 because they LIED, or return it and wait SEVEN DAYS after they get the product back to get my refundso I can buy the $26 bottle like it should be!! !!??? That is not right!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Galindo

customer_reviews.title: the carpet still smelled like urine. So I did everything all over again
customer_reviews.text: It will not remove the smell of cat or dog urine. I worked so hard and went over it many times but this so called animal carpet cleaning soap does not work on urine smell. I did everything exactly how my Kirby Owner's manual instructed me. After the carpet was completely dry and I had vacuumed it all up, the carpet still smelled like urine. So I did everything all over again. The smell is still there. Do not waist your time or money using the Kirby carpet cleaner or shampoo. Go rent a professional carpet cleaner and professional urine eliminator shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - this is a SCENTED product!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that this was SCENTED. THAT is a VERY big deal for me; I CANNOT handle chemically-created scents (cause headaches and adverse body functions for me). NOWHERE on this advertisement does it say that it's scented. I NEED an unscented product. So much for steaming my carpets before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is the only one that really works with the Kirby, good price, great product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a Kirby. It is concentrated so I add water and put it in a spray bottle. Works great on pet stains.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Always excellent shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my dogs aren't "resigning" spots. Always been great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really didn’t like the smell and I didn’t see any cleaning action
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yeater

customer_reviews.title: Not professional strength like the one you get from the real original Kirby system!
customer_reviews.text: It smelled like the shampoo that came the the Kirby but it did not clean as did the real solution. I tried two times with this solution and gave up. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning and deodorizing carpets!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only rug shampoo that I use. I have a dog and a cat and a very old carpet that can get pretty stinky. The carpet comes clean and fresh-scented every time I use the shampoo. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Rubendunst

customer_reviews.title: It helps!
customer_reviews.text: This helps combat the smell that occurred when my pet had accidents to due being ill. It removes the scent of urine and cleans the carpet well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked just as good as the Kirby brand I will use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, gets out the stink..not so much the stains. Would recommend & will use again. KIRBY FAN YEA YEA
customer_reviews.author: chantry

customer_reviews.title: Does not saturate carpet!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and no messy water tanks to fill and empty.
customer_reviews.author: Daveeda

customer_reviews.title: Kirby Shampoo....I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from Amazon because it's convenient. I need it for my Kirby vacuum and the Kirby store is a little to far away.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: THE SCENT IS GREAT BUT MORE IMPORTANTLY TH PRODUCT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Gresham Watts

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the scent and it works very well with my Kirby shampoo system
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Belen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shampoo for the very dirty rug in my sons apartment
customer_reviews.author: jill luthie

customer_reviews.title: I'm allergic to something in it, not sure what ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to something in it, not sure what. I am unable to use due to the odor it permits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells much better😊
customer_reviews.text: I have several pets and this really does work to help rid carpet of odors. It has a fresh clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Branham

customer_reviews.title: cat urine smell to strong for this
customer_reviews.text: doesn't take care of cat urine smell but it definitely works on all the other odors and makes the carpet look brand new again
customer_reviews.author: Jstu

customer_reviews.title: item works great! makes the rooms smell fresh and cleans the ...
customer_reviews.text: item works great! makes the rooms smell fresh and cleans the floors amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: we have a kirby vacuum and the shampoo part is wonderful and we love the product. it smells wonderful and works great. we have tried other products and shampooers but this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible value. It is far cheaper than you can buy at a Kirby retailer, and is the genuine article. The scent is not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Don P.

customer_reviews.title: Beast cleaner ever, smells great l, use for pet accidents!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST cleaner, EVER! I use it for rugs and couch and gets strong pet accidents, smells and stains out, love it! Completely gets rid of urine smell!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to find detailed instructions online or I would have given five stars. This cleaned up all the stains from our carpets. We do have one thing that keeps coming up from the pad that still continues.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have found that this is the best shampoo i have ever used and works just fine in any shampooer.r.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had the normal carpet shampoo but this is better. I use it with the spot remover
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Another
customer_reviews.text: Cleans carpet better than Rug Doctor brand and has enzyme to reduce residual pet urine smell. Scent is ok, but not the primary concern. This is our fourth gallan that we purchased. We will continue to purchase since this.solution is the best we have found.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Beeber

customer_reviews.title: This carpet shampoo worked better than any another similar product
customer_reviews.text: Have used Kirby products for years, but this was the first time we have tried the professional strength carpet shampoo. This carpet shampoo worked better than any another similar product, of any brand name. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: it just works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. what more can be said, it WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: eddie

product_meta.title: Kirby Professional Strength Carpet Shampoo For Pets 237507S
product_meta.description: Kirby Professional Strength Carpet Shampoo For Pet Owners. Heavy Duty Formula Removes Stains And Odors, Safe For Pets And Children. Cleans And Deodorizes In One Step, Leaves No Dirt Attracting Residue. Controls Pet Dander Allergens. Enzymes Attach Odors. For Use With Kirby Home Care System Or Other Carpet Shampooer Units. Kirby Pet Owners Carpet Shampoo Is A Superior Carpet Cleaning Product. It Contains A Balance Of Powerful Soil Dissolvers And Odor Eliminators That Does Two Jobs In One. Also, Powerful Enzymes Digest Pet Dander, Body Oils, Pet Stains, And Other Odor Causing Soils, Rather Than Just Covering Them Up With A Fragrance. Non Toxic, Biodegradable. 128 us fl oz 237507S 49-0192-01 K-237507
feature_bullets: Kirby Professional Strength Carpet Shampoo For Pet Owners.
Heavy Duty Formula Removes Stains And Odors, Safe For Pets And Children.

Cleans And Deodorizes In One Step, Leaves No Dirt Attracting Residue.  Controls Pet Dander Allergens.  Enzymes Attach Odors.  For Use With Kirby Home Care System Or Other Carpet Shampooer Units.  Kirby Pet Owners Carpet Shampoo Is A Superior Carpet Cleaning Product.  It Contains A Balance Of Powerful Soil Dissolves And Odor Eliminators That Does Two Jobs In One.

Also, Powerful Enzymes Digest Pet Dander, Body Oils, Pet Stains, And Other Odor Causing Soils, Rather Than Just Covering Them Up With A Fragrance.  Non Toxic, Biodegradable.  128 us fl oz Professional Strength Carpet Shampoo For Pets 237507S
